description: gofmt: replace defunct test.sh with a go test

messages.text:
Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as 2f11c30b6ba6 ***

gofmt: replace defunct test.sh with a go test

R=r, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5639053

LGTM

Nice.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5639053/diff/4/src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go
File src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5639053/diff/4/src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go#newcode84
src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go:84: // the first and 2nd result should be idempotent
identical

http://codereview.appspot.com/5639053/diff/4/src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go#newcode145
src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go:145: for i := *ngo; i > 0; i-- {
Odd way to write for i := 0; i < *ngo; i++ {.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5639053/diff/4/src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go#newcode150
src/cmd/gofmt/long_test.go:150: for i := *ngo; i > 0; i-- {
Same.

subject: code review 5639053: gofmt: replace defunct test.sh with a go test
